name: gothically
content:
Gothically adverb
(STYLE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is related to the Gothic style of building (= an old European style with pointed arches and windows, high ceilings, and tall, thin columns): Inside the church, the sculpture is wonderfully, Gothically designed. The monastery gothically dominates the skyline.
in a way that is related to Gothic writing or films (= in which strange things happen in frightening places): She plays the Gothically creepy neighbour in his film. It is the darkest and most gothically inflected of his novels.
More examplesFewer examplesThe scene was gothically illuminated by the flickering candles.
